intro1.text: Good morning, Agent Kelley. Please, have a seat.

intro3.text: That was some nasty business in Boston. A string of bank robberies, ending with a shootout that left three good men dead. That's the first time I've seen it get that bad. I'm still impressed you managed to salvage the situation.

choices.text: Well, I certainly wouldn't like to repeat it
They had to be stopped, and we stopped them

intro5.text: Then you'll probably like your next assignment even less

intro6.text: Be that as it may, I'd always prefer a better outcome if it's possible

intro7.text: How much do you know about Cal LaPone?

choices.text: An infamous gangster we've been chasing for years
Big-time mob boss, who we can't touch
A bastard that deserves to hang

intro9.text: That's about the size of it. We know this guy's dirty, but we've just never been able to prove it. He's got a good accountant, a good lawyer, and half of Chicago in his pocket.

intro10.text: But I think we can finally nail him. Forensics are a lot better than they were even ten years ago, and we have powerful friends of our own. The rule of law is not a legal fiction.  We have the tools to enforce it.

intro11.text: While you were in Boston, we received an anonymous tip from inside LaPone's operation. He's got a web of illegitimate enterprises, corrupt connections, and perfidous personalities, and you're going to unravel it starting from that little thread.

choices.text: Well, this ought to be interesting

intro14.text: Ever been on an aeroplane before? Time is of the essence, so you'll be leaving tonight.
